title: What is the progress on bringing Amtrak train service to Wilmington?
text:
From what we can tell, there are no hard and fast plans for a passenger rail service in Wilmington as of right now. 



However, there does seem to be a multi-modal center in the works downtown. Here's what we know so far:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/news/20160808/whats-up-with-wilmingtons-downtown-multi-modal-center



We will continue to report on transportation developments in the area as they come up.
